title: Drawing, "International Casino: Second Floor", October 20, 1936
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Architect's stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE, NEW YORK CITY; see inscription
inscribed: Architect's stamp inscribed in graphite: JoB 546; 1/4"-1'-0; INTERNATIONAL/CASINO; G.L. / D.D. / OCT.20,1936; 12/3/36,1,OFFICE. Inscribed in graphite at lower center: SECOND FLOOR PLAN [double underlined]; at lower right center: SEATING LEGEND [underlined]/ 73 - 30" DIAM. TABLES - 292 PEOPLE/ 28 - 24" x 24" - TABLES - 52 [people]/ 12 - 24" x 24" - TABLES - 52 [people]/ 12 - 24" x 48" - TABLES - 48 [people]/ 21 - 15" x 40" - BENCH T. - 84 [people]/ 476 TOT. PEOPLE. Inscribed in graphite throughout with descriptions.
description: Floor plan of second floor, International Casino, New York City. Floor plan at lower left, elevations in right and upper right corner. Second floor plan shows central bar at center on staircase, with bar located along the staircase on different levels. Chairs, tables, and benches around perimeter of room. Dance floor, stage, and orchestra in lower left corner of room. Tables and chairs around railing overlooking central bar/staircase. Indication of mirrors and lighting throughout. Hall or extension of room to right of main area, housing tables and chairs. Brown carpet in main area, cork floor in hall towards the right. Three elevations at right.
